hero.titleDescription: Handcrafted cookies made with real butter, bold flavors, and a nostalgic touch that makes you fall in love.

vainilla.name: Vanilla Chips
vainilla.description: Classic vanilla cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and a white chocolate pearl.

chocolate.name: Intense Chocolate
chocolate.description: For true chocolate lovers: an elegant cocoa cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and cocoa powder.

red.name: Red Velvet
red.description: Enjoy an everlasting holiday feeling with this innovative Red Velvet cookie, filled with cranberries and topped with powdered sugar and dried cranberries.

marmoleada.name: Marble
marmoleada.description: The best of both worlds: vanilla and cocoa cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and walnuts.

matcha.name: Matcha
matcha.description: A bold-flavored cookie made with matcha, filled with white chocolate and coconut, and topped with white chocolate and coconut.

oreo.name: Oreo
oreo.description: A classic flavor in our bakery: delicious vanilla cookie with Oreo cookie pieces, topped with a whole Oreo cookie.

reyes.name: Reyes
reyes.description: This limited-edition cookie adds an innovative twist to our classic recipe, replacing the topping with white chocolate and quince paste.

contact.important: Your opinion means a lot to us
contact.title: Cookies for your events
contact.description: We create custom cookie orders for events, corporate gifts, and celebrations. Write to us and let’s make something delicious together.
